permissions: User must be authenticated; admins are allowed. Non-admins must have access to all requested broker IDs (membership in the broker or in any customer belonging to the broker).
validation_notes: --entity-type is required and must be one of: transport_order, transport_plan, driver_assignment, live_loads. Filters must include broker; broker may be a comma-separated list of positive IDs. Filters can be provided via --filter key=value (repeatable) or --filters as a JSON object; --filters must be valid JSON and each --filter must include = with a non-empty key. Invalid filter combinations are rejected: trucker is invalid for transport_order and live_loads; customer is invalid for driver_assignment. status may be a comma-separated list and must be valid for the entity type (transport_order: editing, submitted, approved, cancelled, complete, scrapped; transport_plan: editing, approved, complete; driver_assignment: editing, pending, active; live_loads: editing, submitted, approved). customer, trucker, project_office, and project_category must be positive IDs when provided. start_date and end_date must be valid YYYY-MM-DD dates; end_date cannot be before start_date.

flags.name: --entity-type
flags.validation: Must be one of: transport_order, transport_plan, driver_assignment, live_loads.

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be in key=value format (e.g. broker=123).

flags.name: --filters
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON object.
